name: Great Love Immortal Venerate: Why are all my fairies yandere?
summary:
Good news: You've transmigrated as a born protagonist , your confidants have exceptional talents, boasting abilities like Heart Voice, Simulator, Rebirth... and many other top-tier skills. What you only need to do is to wait for one of them to grow up, then you will be invincible to ascend. 

Bad news: They're all yandere !!!

Under the gaze of yandere, Xu Yuan shivered in fear. 

It was not until he was about to be attacked with a firewood cleaver.

"If that's the case, then I'm dropping the act—I am none other than the Great Love Immortal Venerable!"
author: Laminar space-time
